Accommodations

We have always taken "throw what you know" to heart, and are so
excited to get married in the area where we both grew up.

Where should I stay?

We blocked rooms at the following hotels: The Drake, Oak Brook Hills Marriott, and The Hyatt Lodge, which is where the reception will occur. Mention the Skibicki-Cruwys wedding to receive a discount before August 1. As it is Labor Day weekend, we recommend booking in advance. Please click the links below to reserve a room at either hotel or call The Drake directly.

Oak Brook Hills Marriott

Here are some of our favorite places in and around the Hinsdale area. Since there is time between the ceremony and cocktail hour, we recommend checking some out!
